InPlaceArrayNode Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»InPlaceBorderNode. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Array Input TerminalReturns a reference to the array input on an Array Index / Replace Elements border node. Details
Index CountGets or sets the number of index inputs an Array Index / Replace Elements border node contains. When writing the number of inputs, this property grows the border node to accommodate the number of indexes you specify. Details
Index Terminalsl[][]Returns an array of references to the index terminals of an Array Index / Replace Elements border node. Details
Output Terminals[]Returns an array of references to the outputs on an Array Index / Replace Elements border node. Details
Terminal HeightReturns the height, in pixels, of each terminal of an expandable border node on the In Place Element Structure. Details
